channel.title: quinoa on Byzantine Kitchen
channel.description: Recent content in quinoa on Byzantine Kitchen

item.title: Pineapple Curry
item.description: Difficulty: easy Time: 50 mins Ingredients: Coconut oil Shallots Garlic Thai red curry paste turmeric ginger Sweet potatoes Carrots Peppers Coconut milk Soy sauce Pineapple Kale Tofu Coriander Lemon Peanuts Chickpeas Quinoa Instructions Start with a huge pot, put some coconut oil in and add the garlic/shallots (a lot) until they’re starting to fry. Add the turmeric/ginger/red curry paste, mix and so on. Add the potatoes/carrots/peppers and mix so that the spices are spread out properly, give it a bit of time for the flavour to absorb.

item.title: Quinoa Salad
item.description: Difficulty: very easy Time: 25 mins Ingredients (6 persons): 500g quinoa 80g kale 4 apples 300g sweet peppers 5 spring onions 240g can chickpeas 150g cranberries walnut to taste Seasoning: 1 lemon Mustard (1 full tsp) White Vinegar (2 tsp) Balsamic Vinegar (1 tsp) Hemp oil (2 tsp) Instructions: Cook the quinoa in vegetable stock. Wash and cut the sweet peppers, apples, spring onions and kale in small pieces.
